name: Princess Elsa Beauty Salon — Dress up girls games
name_original: Princess Elsa Beauty Salon — Dress up girls games
description:
Princess Elsa is going to have a blind date, dinner will be in an elegant restaurant. She is very excited about the date, maybe find the love she dreamed so much.

The hours pass and she does not hesitate to get ready for the appointment. Your closet is so large that it is difficult to choose, we have to help it !.

Let's dress Elsa in an elegant dress for princesses. She goes to the salon to get her elegant hairstyle; Also choose some heels, and many other accessories, that every girl should use. She will be the center of attention in the restaurant.

There are a variety of suits to combine as you like:

- many tiaras for princesses
- A lot of dresses
- many tops
- many hairstyles, pants, skirts, heels and more

Do you want to be a fashion designer?
Use your creativity to put together the best combinations.

Be a fashion designer and have fun with our dress up games for girls.

Dress up games for girls.
